explains: vi. 即兴表演；即兴说唱
adv. 自由地；随心所欲地
wordGroup: freestyle skiing 自由式滑雪；花样滑雪

sentences.en: Thomson was disqualified from the 400 metre freestyle.
sentences.cn: 汤姆森被取消了400米自由泳的参赛资格。

sentences.en: Only football, volleyball, Greco-Roman wrestling, and freestyle wrestling remained for sale on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 周日只剩足球，排球，古典式摔跤和自由式摔跤门票还没售完。

sentences.en: Freestyle, butterfly, back stroke and breast stroke are four commonly seen strokes in swimming competition.
sentences.cn: 自由泳、蝶泳、仰泳和蛙泳是游泳比赛中常见的四种泳姿。
